title.narrative: Cumulative number of laboratory tests done for suspected COVID-19 cases
Cumulative number of laboratories enrolled on ISO 15189 accreditation maintaining or achieving ISO 15189 accreditation
Cumulative number of targeted hospitals whose isolation and/or ICU facility has been upgraded
Cumulative number of staff trained in laboratory diagnosis of SARS-CoV-2 and other important pathogens
Cumulative number of staff trained in critical and acute medical care
Cumulative number of targeted hospitals whose laboratory spaces have been remodeled/upgraded
Proportion of targeted Regional Referral Hospitals with clinical capacity to manage COVID-19 cases in line with clinical guidelines
Proportion of COVID-19 suspected cases, having laboratory confirmation within 72 hours
Proportion of targeted hospitals with functional oxygen delivery equipment
Proportion of RRHs enrolled on the LQMS scoring >90% in the annual biowaste management audits
Proportion of people travelling through the targeted designated PoEs screened
Proportion of Grievances captured in the Complaints Register for UCREPP that have been “CLOSED OUT” in accordance with GRM under the Project
